CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Mailing_Inserting__c ,"Envelope size"), "Envelope size, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES(Mailing_Inserting__c ,"# Inserts per package"), "# Inserts per package, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES(Mailing_Inserting__c ,"Insert into booklet envelope"), "Insert into booklet envelope, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES(Mailing_Inserting__c ,"Insert into catalog envelope"), "Insert into catalog envelope, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES(Mailing_Inserting__c ,"Nest into another piece"), "Nest into another piece, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES(Mailing_Inserting__c ,"Polybag / Polywrap"), "Polybag / Polywrap, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES(Mailing_Inserting__c ,"Shrinkwrap"), "Shrinkwrap, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES(Mailing_Inserting__c ,"Match 1 insert to address"), "Match 1 insert to address, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES(Mailing_Inserting__c ,"Match 2 insert to address"), "Match 2 insert to address, ",NULL)+''
CustomField.label: Mailing Inserting Formatting
